entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 60
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
